summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4435 for the improvement of 12th Avenue Northeast, from East 75th Street to East 82nd Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52355, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
